title: bank-account
description: This extension creates a new SCO that can be used to represent bank account details.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `bank-account`.

bank.description: Name of the bank account the manages the account.

country.description: 3 digit ISO country code for country of account.

currency.description: 3 digit ISO currency code for currency of account.

holder_name.description: Name of the holder of the account.

iban_number.description: Full IBAN number of the account.

swift_code.description: Full swift code of the account.
